Name: Pisco Kid
Ingredients: 30 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Nestle's Milkybar or other white chocolate.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Garnish with Nestle's Milkybar or other white chocolate.
Review: This short pisco-based spirituous stirred cocktail was inspired by memories of Nestle's Milkybars and the 1980s British TV ads featuring the Milkybar Kid promoting the white chocolate bars. White crème de cacao's sweetness is balanced by dry sherry and the acidity of Sauvignon Blanc wine, which also adds grassy floral notes. The discarded orange zest twist makes the first sip a white chocolate orange experience.
History: Created by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Pisco Kid contains 101 calories
